mapper.select: select ROWNUM r, s.* from(select * from tbl_faq f inner join tbl_code c on f.faq_state = c.code_no)s order by r asc

select ROWNUM r, s.* from(select * from tbl_faq f inner join tbl_code c on f.faq_state = c.code_no)s where code_detail = #{category} and (faq_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or faq_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%') order by r asc
